      • addQuest

        public int addQuest(Quest q)
        Adds a Quest to the quest database
        Parameters:
        q - Quest to be added to the database
        Returns:
        The index of the next quest to be added to the database OR -1 if the quest object is inavalid

      • getQuest

        public Quest getQuest(int id)
        Returns a Quest from the quest database based on its ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID or index of the Quest to be returned
        Returns:
        The Quest that corresponds to the ID, if any, otherwise null
